mapper.update: update project set flag=#{flag} where id=#{id}
update project set show_order=#{showOrder} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.project_no,p.`name`,p.intro,count(s.student_id) stu_count FROM project p INNER JOIN project_student s ON p.id=s.project_id AND p.id=#{id} GROUP BY p.id

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT cc.sid,cc.sname,cc.age,cc.phone,cc.nickname,update_project_count AS updateProjectCount FROM (SELECT bb.*,phone,nickname FROM (SELECT aa.*,userid FROM (SELECT sname,sid,age FROM student_management WHERE sid in (SELECT student_id FROM project_student WHERE project_id=#{id}))aa JOIN user_stu_teacher WHERE aa.sid=user_stu_teacher.studentid)bb JOIN user_manage WHERE bb.userid=user_manage.userid)cc JOIN project_student WHERE cc.sid=project_student.student_id)dd
WHERE dd.sname LIKE concat('%',#{sname},'%')
SELECT p.project_no,p.`name`,p.intro,count(c.course_id) course_count FROM project p INNER JOIN course_project c ON p.id=c.project_id AND p.id=#{id} GROUP BY p.id

SELECT count(*) FROM course WHERE course_id in (SELECT course_id FROM course_project WHERE project_id=#{id})
AND course.course_name like concat('%',#{course_name},'%')
